title: The Art of Pixar: The Complete Colorscripts from 25 Years of Feature Films
description:
Since Toy Story's release in 1995, Pixar Animation Studios has set the standard for contemporary animation with a range of classic and influential feature films and shorts.

In this revised and expanded edition for the 25th anniversary of Pixar's feature films, The Art of Pixar collects the breathtaking behind-the-scenes visual process of colorscripts.

Colorscripts are the sequential paintings that visually represent key story moments from each film and set the lighting, color, and tone during the filmmaking process. This expanded edition features colorscripts from Pixar's feature films and shorts through Onward and Soul as well as Academy Award-winning Coco, Inside Out, and Brave.

Packaged in a luxe slipcase, this collectible collection is a treasure trove of artwork for aspiring animators and Pixar fans alike. It's the perfect gift for animation and filmmaking students, film buffs, and more

  • Format: Hardcover
  • Dimensions: 11 x 9 in.
  • Pages: 320
